title: Upscale LOFT in DTLA | High Ceiling | Central Air/Heat | SS Appliances
map_address: South Santa Fe Avenue near East 2nd Street
posting_body: ['Riverfront Lofts, nestled in the heart of the Arts District in Downtown Los Angeles, is less than half a mile to the festive Little Tokyo area and Union Station / Olvera Street Historic Site.', 'Grab some coffee at Café Gratitude, less than a mile away, or enjoy a wonderful performance at the Walt Disney Concert Hall.', 'Commuting is easy when you can hop on any LA freeway within 5 minutes.', 'Riverfront Lofts offers unique apartment features such as polished concrete floors, large industrial style windows, and exposed air ducts.', 'Our amenities are sure to keep you occupied.', 'Catch some rays hanging at the pool.', 'Feel free to have some fun in our clubhouse or just sit and relax in our hot tub.', 'Keep up with your fitness goals, and put in some solid work out time at our fitness center.', 'Socialize with your neighbors or invite some friends to check out a movie at our outdoor projection screen outdoor lounge.', 'Live centralized, luxuriously, and comfortable at Riverfront Lofts.', '☎', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- Large Industrial Style Windows', '- Stainless Steel Refrigerator', '- Central Air and Heating', '- Stainless Steel Stove Top Range Oven', '- High Ceilings', '- Quartz Counters', '- Polished Concrete Floors', 'Community Amenities:', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Gated Parking ($100 Monthly Fee)', '- Elevator', '- Laundry Facilities', 'Off Site Amenities Available with Monthly Membership Fee:', '- Outdoor Projection Screening Area with Lounge', '- Pool', '- Clubhouse', '- Fitness Center', '- Spa/Hot Tub', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Square ft. is approximate.', '201 South Santa Fe Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90012']
